p: A comprehensive overview of general immunization principles and recommendations can be found in Ref. [ 160]. The schedule for immunization of immunocompetent infants, children, and adolescents is shown in Fig. 1.5 [ 161], and for immunocompetent adults in Fig. 1.6 [ 211]. They reflect recommendations that took effect in 2013 and will obviously be modified as new agents and regimens are found to be effective.
